author: jsdelfino
msg: Minor code cleanup. Removed RMIHost from host-spi module, as host-spi should not be transport specific. The RMIHost support will have to be packaged in a separate module like what has been done for the HTTP ServletHost.

author: jacopoc
msg: Fixed wrong selection for drop down options of carrier ship methods in stor ship settings.

author: rfeng
msg: Only add checked exception to fault types

author: jsdelfino
msg: Fixed policy support. Policy intents are now read on Java implementations and WS bindings. Also added a policy annotation processor to read @Requires annotations on implementation classes, interfaces and methods, equivalent to the patch contributed in TUSCANY-1204.
